rule: Label is True *iff* the first non‑space character is a vowel.
correct: The input starts with a vowel.
distractors: The input contains exactly five words.
The input ends with a question mark.
The input is all uppercase letters.

Elephants are the largest land mammals on Earth.
Our team won the championship game last night!
Umbrella sales increase significantly during the rainy season.
